summary: You know what I love about Captain Marvel?
body:
You know what I love about Captain Marvel?

That’s she’s not just a woman with the traits of a stereotypical leading man. She’s complex, she’s emotional, she grew within herself without the validation of a man to assure her.

She’s someone we can all see ourselves as.

You have no idea how proud I felt when I saw her in her mask and non-sexualized suit with her bombass flamey hands. For once, my tears were not for sadness but for pride.

Also, fury you did great as the strong yet sassy sidekick, but we all know the cat’s the real mvp.

summary:
Chapter 2 of Eddie’s story posted :D The Venom Verse - Chapter 2: Hunger (on Wattpad) https://my.w.tt/TzfD2Qck1U

There are many...
caption:
Chapter 2 of Eddie’s story posted :D

The Venom Verse - Chapter 2: Hunger (on Wattpad) https://my.w.tt/TzfD2Qck1U There are many different dimensions of our world. Or as some call it “The Multiverse.” But one things for certain it seems no matter the dimension no matter the world. We are always meant to find each other. No matter how long it takes. No matter the pain and suffering we have to go through. We will always find one another.

blog.name: ao3feed-clintxnat
blog.title: love is for children, i owe him a debt.
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of all fic posted on the Archive Of Our Own under the Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov pairing tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed using an IFTTT recipe, but this was made easy thanks to astolat (astolat.tumblr.com). If you would like to set up a similar blog, see the instructions tab :) To check announcements regarding these blogs, go to the tumblr tag #ao3feed announcement. (moderated by enjolbutt.tumblr.com) I hope this blog helps when you are in dire need of feels or a laugh, so enjoy! :)

title: To Love With Monstrous Souls
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Uz7RFV

by Triangulum

She’s waiting out front when Steve brings him to the Avengers compound in upstate New York. She’s standing at the building’s entrance, back straight and hands loose at her sides, a blonde man on her left. His stance in casual, but his eyes are alert and focused. James recognizes him instantly, not just as their archer, but as a fellow sniper. He vaguely thinks he may have encountered him in South Africa, but he isn’t sure. He presents himself as relaxed, but James knows instantly that he’s dangerous.

Words: 12183, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Captain America (Movies)
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M, M/M
  • Characters: James “Bucky” Barnes, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Steve Rogers, Wanda Maximoff
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov, James “Bucky” Barnes/Natasha Romanov, Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov, James “Bucky” Barnes/Clint Barton
  • Additional Tags: Oral Sex, Vaginal Sex, Anal Sex, Threesome - F/M/M, Getting Together, Not Avengers: Age of Ultron (Movie) Compliant, Not Captain America: Civil War (Movie) Compliant, Bucky Barnes Recovering, Established Natasha Romanov/Clint Barton


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Uz7RFV

body:
Daily Life in Avengers Tower (30/150)

Original Post by 最安神 on Weibo

Link: https://m.weibo.cn/3674108277/4243328583329637

Translation(permitted by op) by Artemis_jry

Note from translator: All mistakes are on me 100%. Bolded ones are tweaked to fit better culturally. Italicized ones are tweaked to make the pun work in English. Keep in mind that this is a crack post, and not meant to be taken seriously. also keep in mind that the Chinese Marvel fandom has some different widely accepted head canons. Enjoy!

Daily life in the Avengers Tower:

1. Dr. Banner’s bed is huge. It’s mostly Hulk who sleeps in the bed—Banner sleeps in the crater left by him.

2. According to our meticulous research, Banner is present for usual work, showers, and chores; Hulk is present only during meals.

3. Vision finally grasped the concept of walls after ending up in the ladies’ room the seventh time. He also grasped the concept of Nat’s thigh choke too.

4. Peter tried on Tony’s armor. When he realized that he can’t scratch an itching thigh in armor, Peter gave up.

5. Vision is the only one capable of sitting through Peter’s endless babbles: Vision just watches Youtube videos in his mind.

6. After a friendly conversation with the National Weather Service, Thor’s hammer was confiscated and he was sent to his room to learn the children’s song “I hear thunder”.

7. Peter Parker(enthusiastically): “Hey man!” Peter Quill(teary-eyed): “…”

8. Loki was saved again by his tendency to get teary-eyed in the wind after stabbing his brother. Again.

9. When Black Panther first moved in: Drax: How can you see me? Nat: You MAY be a panther but I’m NOT a widow. Spidey: Can you scratch the back of your head with your legs? Can you?!

10. Dr. Strange don’t like hanging out with others, which explains why there’s four of him playing bridge with himself right now.

11. Drax: I lost my family. Peter: Same. Drax: Do you have any family members left? Peter: May. Drax: MAY you have any family members left??

12. Starlord never understood how Bucky is significantly lighter than him even though they look about the same size, until he saw Bucky taking his arm off before going on the scale.

13. Cap never got the jokes during meetings, so Bucky tugs on Cap’s shirt to remind him to laugh. And when Cap is wearing spandex, well.. “SMACK!”

14. Peter got into trouble and end up being carried away by Tony in the armor. Cap: Come on Tony, the armor? That’s a little too harsh. Tony: I’m too short to carry Peter without it.

15. At the Halloween masquerade party, Dr. Strange was easily recognizable due to his extra long mask.

16. Peter Parker: Let’s dress up as animals this Halloween! I’ll be a spider, Mantis will be a mantis, and Black Panther will be a panther. Dr. Strange can be a horse. Dr. Strange: ???

17. T’challa felt that the crossed arms salute may not seem approachable enough. He started doing double-peace-signs instead.

18. Thor and Cap are feeling each other’s pecs after workout. T’challa wonders if its an American or Asgardian thing.

19. In order to catch up with the younger members, Cap was looking at memes at night. He laughed hysterically from 11pm to 4am, pausing for breath three times only.

20. Natasha had to take away Cap’s computer at five in the morning; she also had to stop Thor from from electrocuting Cap.

21. Peter Parker: Mr. Panther do you like milk? Peter Parker: Mr. Panther do you have vertical pupils? Peter Parker: Mr. Panther do you have nine lives? T’Challa(slightly annoyed): Do you eat bugs? Peter Parker: OMG yoU ThInK i’M A sPidEr?? QAQ

22. Starlord: So how do you stay so fit? Peter Parker: Well I can teach you some basic moves. Peter Parker: So we start off by standing on the ceiling— Starlord: BYE

23. Loki was not allowed around any knives. However, after watching The Dark Knight out of boredom, Loki came to the epiphany: knives aren’t the only way to stab people.

24. Nebula took her mechanic eye out for maintenance. Rocket: WOW!!!!!!!!! Bucky: You use to love my arm more…

25. Dr. Strange had a fight with his Cloak—it was jealous of his towel.

26. Cap: I have a joke for—haha—for you guys haha*already wheezing* Bucky: Everybody, laugh!!

27. Karen: Peter Parker if you throw me into the washing machine one more time I swear—

28. In face of the enemy, Vision shot out laser beam, and Black Panther started chasing it around uncontrollably

29. Groot: I am Groot! Spidey: Wow new friend! Spidey(w/ low voice): Hi, I’m Batman

30. Wanda and Vision planned on starting a housing demolition team after retiring. Vision makes a few cracks, and Wanda handles the rest.

reblog.comment:

10. Dr. Strange don’t like hanging out with others, which explains why there’s four of him playing bridge with himself right now.

11. Drax: I lost my family. Peter: Same. Drax: Do you have any family members left? Peter: May. Drax: MAY you have any family members left??

12. Starlord never understood how Bucky is significantly lighter than him even though they look about the same size, until he saw Bucky taking his arm off before going on the scale.

13. Cap never got the jokes during meetings, so Bucky tugs on Cap’s shirt to remind him to laugh. And when Cap is wearing spandex, well.. “SMACK!”

14. Peter got into trouble and end up being carried away by Tony in the armor. Cap: Come on Tony, the armor? That’s a little too harsh. Tony: I’m too short to carry Peter without it.

15. At the Halloween masquerade party, Dr. Strange was easily recognizable due to his extra long mask.

16. Peter Parker: Let’s dress up as animals this Halloween! I’ll be a spider, Mantis will be a mantis, and Black Panther will be a panther. Dr. Strange can be a horse. Dr. Strange: ???

17. T’challa felt that the crossed arms salute may not seem approachable enough. He started doing double-peace-signs instead.

18. Thor and Cap are feeling each other’s pecs after workout. T’challa wonders if its an American or Asgardian thing.

19. In order to catch up with the younger members, Cap was looking at memes at night. He laughed hysterically from 11pm to 4am, pausing for breath three times only.

20. Natasha had to take away Cap’s computer at five in the morning; she also had to stop Thor from from electrocuting Cap.

21. Peter Parker: Mr. Panther do you like milk? Peter Parker: Mr. Panther do you have vertical pupils? Peter Parker: Mr. Panther do you have nine lives? T’Challa(slightly annoyed): Do you eat bugs? Peter Parker: OMG yoU ThInK i’M A sPidEr?? QAQ

22. Starlord: So how do you stay so fit? Peter Parker: Well I can teach you some basic moves. Peter Parker: So we start off by standing on the ceiling— Starlord: BYE

23. Loki was not allowed around any knives. However, after watching The Dark Knight out of boredom, Loki came to the epiphany: knives aren’t the only way to stab people.

24. Nebula took her mechanic eye out for maintenance. Rocket: WOW!!!!!!!!! Bucky: You use to love my arm more…

25. Dr. Strange had a fight with his Cloak—it was jealous of his towel.

26. Cap: I have a joke for—haha—for you guys haha*already wheezing* Bucky: Everybody, laugh!!

27. Karen: Peter Parker if you throw me into the washing machine one more time I swear—

28. In face of the enemy, Vision shot out laser beam, and Black Panther started chasing it around uncontrollably

29. Groot: I am Groot! Spidey: Wow new friend! Spidey(w/ low voice): Hi, I’m Batman

30. Wanda and Vision planned on starting a housing demolition team after retiring. Vision makes a few cracks, and Wanda handles the rest.

Note from translator: All mistakes are on me 100%. Bolded ones are tweaked to fit better culturally. Italicized ones are tweaked to make the pun work in English. Keep in mind that this is a crack post, and not meant to be taken seriously. also keep in mind that the Chinese Marvel fandom has some different widely accepted head canons. Enjoy!

Daily life in the Avengers Tower:

1. Dr. Banner’s bed is huge. It’s mostly Hulk who sleeps in the bed—Banner sleeps in the crater left by him.

2. According to our meticulous research, Banner is present for usual work, showers, and chores; Hulk is present only during meals.

3. Vision finally grasped the concept of walls after ending up in the ladies’ room the seventh time. He also grasped the concept of Nat’s thigh choke too.

4. Peter tried on Tony’s armor. When he realized that he can’t scratch an itching thigh in armor, Peter gave up.

5. Vision is the only one capable of sitting through Peter’s endless babbles: Vision just watches Youtube videos in his mind.

6. After a friendly conversation with the National Weather Service, Thor’s hammer was confiscated and he was sent to his room to learn the children’s song “I hear thunder”.

7. Peter Parker(enthusiastically): “Hey man!” Peter Quill(teary-eyed): “…”

8. Loki was saved again by his tendency to get teary-eyed in the wind after stabbing his brother. Again.

9. When Black Panther first moved in: Drax: How can you see me? Nat: You MAY be a panther but I’m NOT a widow. Spidey: Can you scratch the back of your head with your legs? Can you?!

10. Dr. Strange don’t like hanging out with others, which explains why there’s four of him playing bridge with himself right now.

15. At the Halloween masquerade party, Dr. Strange was easily recognizable due to his extra long mask.

16. Peter Parker: Let’s dress up as animals this Halloween! I’ll be a spider, Mantis will be a mantis, and Black Panther will be a panther. Dr. Strange can be a horse. Dr. Strange: ???

17. T’challa felt that the crossed arms salute may not seem approachable enough. He started doing double-peace-signs instead.

18. Thor and Cap are feeling each other’s pecs after workout. T’challa wonders if its an American or Asgardian thing.

19. In order to catch up with the younger members, Cap was looking at memes at night. He laughed hysterically from 11pm to 4am, pausing for breath three times only.

20. Natasha had to take away Cap’s computer at five in the morning; she also had to stop Thor from from electrocuting Cap.

21. Peter Parker: Mr. Panther do you like milk? Peter Parker: Mr. Panther do you have vertical pupils? Peter Parker: Mr. Panther do you have nine lives? T’Challa(slightly annoyed): Do you eat bugs? Peter Parker: OMG yoU ThInK i’M A sPidEr?? QAQ

22. Starlord: So how do you stay so fit? Peter Parker: Well I can teach you some basic moves. Peter Parker: So we start off by standing on the ceiling— Starlord: BYE

23. Loki was not allowed around any knives. However, after watching The Dark Knight out of boredom, Loki came to the epiphany: knives aren’t the only way to stab people.

24. Nebula took her mechanic eye out for maintenance. Rocket: WOW!!!!!!!!! Bucky: You use to love my arm more…

25. Dr. Strange had a fight with his Cloak—it was jealous of his towel.

26. Cap: I have a joke for—haha—for you guys haha*already wheezing* Bucky: Everybody, laugh!!

27. Karen: Peter Parker if you throw me into the washing machine one more time I swear—

28. In face of the enemy, Vision shot out laser beam, and Black Panther started chasing it around uncontrollably

29. Groot: I am Groot! Spidey: Wow new friend! Spidey(w/ low voice): Hi, I’m Batman
